abstract: Plains Al American Pipeline, company responsible for pipeline that spilled thousands of gallons of oil along California coast, is ordered to take series of safety steps before it can restart line.
lead_paragraph: The Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration required Plains All American Pipeline to remove the damaged section of pipe, test it and empty the remainder of the line.

headline.main: California: Tests Ordered After Oil Leak
headline.print_headline: California: Tests Ordered After Oil Leak

snippet: The Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration required Plains All American Pipeline to remove the damaged section of pipe, test it and empty the remainder of the line.
